name: Refable
description: Exposes a reference to the component, and method to find other components within it's scope. Intended for complex nested circumstances where the components scope could be changed (like custom strand-grid items).

attributes.name: ref
attributes.description: Returns a referece to the component itself.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Returns a reference to an element within the scope of this element. Intended for complex nested circumstances where the components scope could be changed (like custom strand-grid items).

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The id of the component to find.
